description:
Fans of one Disney film in particular will be excited to know a sequel is on the way. What’s especially exciting about this specific follow-up, however, is that its set to arrive 22 years after its predecessor was released! It’s surely about time, especially with several original cast members set to return. The sequel has [...]

title: Hit Disney Movie To Receive Sequel 22 Years Later

description:
When released in 2019, Joker was a big hit, making over a billion dollars at the box office and granting actor Joaquin Phoenix an Oscar. It would only come naturally that the Todd Phillips-directed movie would get a sequel greenlit—which was released this year. Unfortunately, the critical and commercial flop of that film, Joker: Folie [...]

The post Exclusive: ‘Hellboy: The Crooked Man’ Actor Jack Kesy Wants To Play Joker Or Gambit appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Exclusive: ‘Hellboy: The Crooked Man’ Actor Jack Kesy Wants To Play Joker Or Gambit
